name: Fluffal Dolphin
text: You can target 1 "Toy Vendor" in your GY; Set it to your field, and if you do, send 1 "Edge Imp Sabres" or 1 "Fluffal" monster from your Deck to the GY. If this card is sent to the GY as material for a Fusion Summon: You can shuffle 1 of your "Polymerization" Spells or "Fusion" Spells that is banished or in your GY into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Fluffal Dolphin" once per turn.
